content.metaTitle: Luxury Frontline Villa Jávea | 4 Bed Sea View Chalet MIR0054
content.metaDescription: Exclusive 4-bedroom frontline villa in Jávea's prestigious Portichol area. 1,920m² plot, infinity pool, spa, elevator. Built by renowned Miralbo Urbana.
content.heroIntro:
Discover unparalleled luxury living with this exceptional frontline villa, perfectly positioned on a magnificent 1,920m² plot in one of Jávea's most coveted locations. Chalet MIR0054 represents the pinnacle of Costa Blanca sophistication, offering breathtaking south-facing sea views that stretch endlessly across the Mediterranean horizon.

Crafted by the renowned Miralbo Urbana, this architectural masterpiece seamlessly blends contemporary design with luxurious comfort. From the moment you enter through the elegant reception hall, you'll be captivated by panoramic vistas that serve as a stunning backdrop to every living space. This isn't just a home – it's a lifestyle statement that epitomizes the very best of Mediterranean coastal living.

locationSection.intro:
Nestled in the prestigious Portichol - Balcón al Mar area of Jávea, this exclusive location represents one of the Costa Blanca's most sought-after addresses. The elevated position provides unobstructed views across pristine coastline while maintaining complete privacy and tranquility. This prime location offers the perfect balance between serene residential living and convenient access to Jávea's vibrant town center and beautiful beaches.

The Portichol area is renowned for attracting discerning international buyers who appreciate the combination of natural beauty, exclusivity, and investment stability. With its protected coastline status and limited development opportunities, this location ensures your investment remains both unique and valuable for generations to come.
highlights: Frontline position with unobstructed Mediterranean sea views
Walking distance to Jávea's pristine beaches and coves
15 minutes to Jávea town center with restaurants and amenities
Protected natural environment ensuring long-term exclusivity
Easy access to Valencia (1.5 hours) and Alicante Airport (1 hour)

propertyFeatures.intro: This remarkable villa showcases meticulous attention to detail across its 371m² of built space, enhanced by 236m² of stunning terraces. Every element has been carefully designed to maximize the spectacular sea views while creating luxurious living spaces that flow seamlessly between indoor and outdoor areas.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms with 6 bathrooms, all with sea views
Private elevator connecting all levels for ultimate convenience
70m² infinity pool with panoramic Mediterranean views
Exclusive spa area with heated indoor pool in basement level
Open-plan living with large kitchen island and premium finishes
Automatic blinds and air conditioning throughout
Double-glazed windows for optimal comfort and energy efficiency
Interior alarm system and advanced access control
Customizable design to create your perfect home

content.investmentSection:
This frontline villa represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Spain's most stable and desirable property markets. Jávea's coastal properties have consistently demonstrated strong capital appreciation, particularly in premium locations like Portichol where development is strictly limited. The combination of sea views, quality construction by Miralbo Urbana, and prime positioning ensures this property will remain highly sought-after by both owner-occupiers and rental tenants.

The Costa Blanca continues to attract international buyers seeking luxury Mediterranean properties, with Jávea standing out for its natural beauty, excellent climate, and strong rental yields. Properties of this caliber in frontline positions are increasingly rare, making this villa not just a beautiful home but a sound financial investment that offers both immediate enjoyment and long-term wealth preservation.
whyBuySection: Unbeatable frontline position with guaranteed unobstructed sea views
Constructed by Miralbo Urbana, renowned for exceptional quality and reliability
Customizable design allows you to create your perfect dream home
Private spa and heated pool for year-round luxury relaxation
Prime Costa Blanca location with excellent rental and resale potential
Comprehensive security features and premium comfort amenities
Generous 1,920m² plot ensuring complete privacy and exclusivity

faqs.question: What is the asking price for Chalet MIR0054?
faqs.answer: The price is available on request. Please contact us for detailed pricing information and flexible payment terms that can be tailored to your requirements.

faqs.question: Can I get a Spanish mortgage for this property?
faqs.answer: Yes, Spanish mortgages are available for international buyers. We work with Habeno mortgage specialists who can arrange competitive financing options, typically up to 70% of the property value.

faqs.question: When will the villa be completed?
faqs.answer: As this is a bespoke project by Miralbo Urbana, completion timeframes depend on your customization requirements. Typically, construction takes 18-24 months from contract signing.

faqs.question: What's included in the purchase price?
faqs.answer: The villa includes all fixtures, fittings, air conditioning, automatic blinds, elevator, security systems, pool, spa facilities, and landscaped gardens. Full specifications are available upon request.

faqs.question: How is the rental potential for this property?
faqs.answer: Frontline villas in Jávea command premium rental rates, especially with luxury amenities like a spa and infinity pool. Annual rental yields of 5-7% are typical for properties of this caliber.

faqs.question: Can I customize the villa design?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Miralbo Urbana offers complete customization of layouts, finishes, and features to create your perfect home while maintaining the architectural integrity of the design.

faqs.question: What are the annual running costs?
faqs.answer: Annual costs include property tax (IBI), community fees (minimal for individual villas), utilities, insurance, and optional property management services. We can provide detailed cost breakdowns.

faqs.question: Can I arrange a viewing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can arrange site visits to view the location and similar Miralbo properties. Virtual tours and detailed plans are also available for international buyers.

content.conclusion: Chalet MIR0054 represents a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to own a piece of Costa Blanca paradise in one of Jávea's most prestigious locations. With its unbeatable frontline position, luxury amenities, and customizable design by renowned Miralbo Urbana, this villa offers the perfect combination of investment potential and lifestyle excellence. Don't miss this chance to secure your dream Mediterranean home – contact us today to discuss this exceptional property and arrange your exclusive viewing.
